title: pAnam sheyya
sahitya:
pAnam sheyya vArIr rAma nAma sudhArasattai


anupallavi

  gAnam sheidu kazhal pOTri jAnaki ramaNan sEvai kaliyil kaNDa tyAgarAja svAmi namakkaLitta amuda


caraNam    vEdap-poruL dAsharathiyai kAdal pongak-kanindu tuditta nAda vEda pArangadar gAna rasattinai kaLippuravE
